name: Roberts et al., Appellants, v. Washington Trust Company

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Roberts et al., Appellants, v. Washington Trust Company.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The learned judge of the court below, recently deceased, admirably stated the facts and the law applicable to this case, and the judgment is accordingly affirmed on Ms opinion.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Richard G. Miller, with him John C. Judson and Norman E. Clark, for appellee, were not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Roberts et al., Appellants, v. Washington Trust Company.
Argued November 29, 1933.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
January 2, 1934:
Robert H. Loche, for appellants.
Richard G. Miller, with him John C. Judson and Norman E. Clark, for appellee, were not heard.
